casebody.data:
State of North Carolina
v.
Dominique Jevon Perry No. 81A14 Supreme Court of North Carolina. January 28, 2016. Barbara S. Blackman, Assistant Appellate Defender, for Perry, Dominique Jevon. Staples Hughes, Durham. Robert C. Montgomery, Special Deputy Attorney General, J. Douglas Henderson, District Attorney, for State of North Carolina.

ORDER

The Court, on its own motion, orders that the parties submit supplemental briefs on the effect of Montgomery v. Louisiana , No. 14-280, 2016 WL 280758 (U.S. Jan. 25, 2016, revised Jan. 27, 2016), on the proceedings in this case. Defendant's supplemental brief shall be filed no later than thirty days after the date of this order, and the State's supplemental brief shall be filed no later than thirty days following defendant's filing.

By order of the Court in Conference, this 28 th day of January, 2016.
